name: Link Smash Fruits Jewel Mania: Swipe Drawpipe Bump Puzzle!
name_original: Link Smash Fruits Jewel Mania: Swipe Drawpipe Bump Puzzle!
description:
Classic Link/match Game available now for free!

Link Fruit Candy is a very addictive and best match-three casual game! It is a very challenging game to practice reaction speed. Destroy the fruits by connect three or more same fruits, try to use game item to make more combos!

HOW TO PLAY

● Connect three or more same fruits to score points.
● Archive the target points to level up.
● Eliminate the more fruits line quickly can get extra scores.


Link Fruit Candy FEATURES

● More than 100 challenging levels & many game props.
● Easy and fun to play, but a challenge to fully master.
● Sweet and delicious UI & cool animation effects.

Link Fruit Candy is best-looking free fruit matching game for your phone.
a big THANK YOU goes out to everyone who has played Link Fruit Candy!
Play the game and Have Fun!!!
